column5: HIT 2 TRIBS TODAY AND MISSED 2 HITS!!! ICE IS A GOOD 6-8"OF GOOD BLACK ICE!!! COLD SNAP COMIN IN SO BREAK OUT THE HOTSHOTS ALL  LOL BACK AT HER NEXT WEEK!!!  WELL I GOTTA POST A PIC SO HERE IS MY BIGGEST STEELHEAD EVER!! A 22LB BRUTE!!! MAN IT WAS A HELL OF A FIGHT!! I KNOW THE PICTURE DOES IT NO JUSTICE BUT ME BEING 285LBS MAKES IT LOOK SMALL  LOL WAS A TRUE BEAUTY INDEED!!!   HAVE A GREAT AND SAFE WEEKEND FISHIN ALL!!

Sorry to hear about your skunk today!  That is a great PB photo you have there!!! I can only dream of a steelie that big.  Better luck next time...something tells me we'll be seeing lots of pics in your next report.
Can't win em all I guess.....Nice going on the fishing lately.. Thanks for the reports
You can tell that's a big fish. Just look at the tension on your face holding it up. It's HEAVYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYY!     dsn
well done CC,thats a huge steelhead,very nice pic,well better luck next time...and its not like you need it either...lol...lol
Great stuff bud  That fish is a real brute...  You will get'em next time..good luck on the ice

Scott, even a person of your size cannot make that fish look small, it is definately a big fish, and extremely thick in girth and the shoulders, well done. Thanks for the post, I won't be after steel until mid april, and will not catch anything near that size up here. Heck, I hope we have enough water to even fish for them, we were in drought conditions in the fall, all of our rivers were mere trickles up the north shore. I didn't even bother to bother the fish in those conditions.  We need precipitation up here badly, for the spawn, and for the fire fighting season. Lots of people have dry wells, and have to haul water in their trucks for general consumption. Lots of people up here have to shower at their workplace, and if that option is not available, join a club to shower before work, the water levels are that bad up here.
I wouldnt have believed it if I didn't read it for myself.  You got goosed.  Kind of good in a way, because I never saw that georgeous fish yet.

TX ALL!!! TJSA HOW FAR NORTH ARE YA?? LOL  THE CLIMATE HAVE REALLY TAKE A TURN FOR THE WORSE LATELY FOR RIVER RUNNING FISH!!! LETS HOPE YA GOT LOTS OF SNOW AND THERES A DECENT MELT OFF TO START THINGS UP!!!
